title: Dr. Crystal Glassy, DO - Los Angeles, CA | Family Medicine on Doximity
description: Dr. Crystal Glassy, DO is a board certified family physician in Los Angeles, California.
cleaned_text: Dr. Glassy is on Doximity As a Doximity member you'll join over two million verified healthcare professionals in a private, secure network. - Connect with other colleagues in the same hospital or clinic - Search all U.S. specialist profiles and refer a patient - Read the latest clinical news and earn CME/CEU credits Office10250 Santa Monica Blvd suite 2440 Los Angeles, CA 90067Phone+1 310-286-0122 [Is this information wrong?](https://www.doximity.com/profile/db2ed918-4118-41ee-b4db-780a7ce348f4/correction_requests/new) Summary - Dual board certified in both family medicine and integrative medicine. Currently practicing at UCLA Medical Center.
